edu.ncsu.csc216.todolist

Class ToDoList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.todolist.ToDoList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

    public class ToDoList
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
    The main class for the ToDoList program. Holds references to the top-level data structures that contain Task and Category objects and acts as the controller between the model and the GUI presentation view.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Wright
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
